basic.description: Topics include: types of geosynthetics and manufacturing processes; properties and test methods; methods of analysis and design for geosynthetics used for separation, filtration, soil reinforcement, erosion control and liquid/hazardous waste containment. Held at Queen's or RMC depending on enrolment. Three term-hours, lectures. NOTE: This is a joint course with RMC Civil Engineering Department.
basic.subject: CIVL
basic.title: Geosynthetics In Geotech. Engr
